reviews.review: How do you mix 19 films and independent characters seamlessly into one giant and fast paced movie? Take note DCU, you supremely suck in comparison.

There is no amount of binge watching, YouTube theory watching, or idea spit balling you can do to prepare you for what comes in this movie. Easily a top 3 MCU movie (I'd put it right after Iron Man 1 and Avengers 1). Obviously being part 1 of a 2 part movie process, there is more to come. But I can tell you the Russo Brothers pulled it off. Thanos lives up to the hype and 10 years of world building is payed off. While not every character you love in the MCU gets a ton of screen time, they all play a necessary role in completing this epic story. I can't believe I have to wait a full year to see how this tale is complete.
Everything about this movie was just amazing. Definitely worth seeing
really good movie the best of the saga

Infinity war has been 10 years in the making. Each MCU movie starting all the way with iron man has been leading to this, right when nick fury broke into tony starks house talking about the avengers was the first step and it was all leading here to the end. The story juggles almost every character introduced in the mcu in this movie(those who were not will for sure show up next year) as they find out about the master plan of the mad titian thanos as he looks to wipe out half of the universe. The star of this movie is thanos who is maybe the best cbm villain beating out heath ledgers joker as his motives are somewhat heroic but insane he is as frighting as he is interesting and sympathetic 10 years for him was well worth the wait. The rest of the characters play off each other well and add complex to the story as we do feel like the weight of everything is on the line in this film. The humor of the mcu is also not lost. First timers to the mcu will come to love these characters as well, and like everyone the haunting ending will bring a tear to anyones eye. Infinity war lives up to the hype and beyond, the end of everything has never been this good.
This first was a load of fun.  The 2nd was a mess. This was better than the 2nd but really not that fun.  Every thing that happened will be undone by time travel.in the next.
Best marvel movie yet. Dramatic and emotional while being clever and funny with amazing action, setting, and visuals.

So nice I watched it twice.
If you like the marvel movies of late, go watch it. If super hero movies or marvel aren't your thing, then this is probably not your movie.

Infinity War is a great film. Infinity War serves fans justice buy not re-explaining everything that happened in previous Marvel movies, instead it continues with the story. The character interactions are great and it shows how well Marvel has developed each character. The film has you constantly on the edge of your seat you and it leavers you eagerly waiting for Avengers 4.
